entry.title: Mack AC (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Mack Trucks adopted the Bulldog as its corporate logo after World War I British soldiers nicknamed the Mack AC (example pictured) the "Bulldog", a reference to the model's tenacity and stub nose?

entry.title: Aaron Martin (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Aaron Martin missed his penalty kick in the longest penalty shoot-out in English professional football history?

entry.title: Polish proverbs (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that there are tens of thousands of Polish proverbs, the oldest known of which dates to the year 1407?

entry.title: Concerto for Two Cellos, RV 531 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Concerto for Two Cellos, RV 531, Antonio Vivaldi's only concerto for two cellos, begins unusually with the two soloists entering alone in fast imitation?

entry.title: Robert M. Briggs (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Robert M. Briggs won re-election to the Wisconsin State Assembly by promising Beetown a double-track railway that was "like two rows of brass buttons on a double-breasted vest"?

entry.title: Stuyvesant Farm (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that when England moved to take over the Dutch colony of New Netherland in 1664, a delegation met at Stuyvesant Farm to negotiate the Articles of Surrender?

entry.title: Abraham O. Woodruff (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Abraham O. Woodruff married a second wife 11 years after his father, Wilford Woodruff, issued the 1890 Manifesto that banned the practice of plural marriage?

entry.title: Margaret Clemence (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Brookside character Margaret Clemence was featured in a female same-sex kiss that was rebroadcast during the opening ceremony of the 2012 Summer Olympics?

entry.title: 女子高速上屁股被戳伤 竟是一块铁片从底盘刺穿座椅 (快科技)

entry.title: 男子用瓜子袋屏蔽ETC三个月逃费22次！网友：得不偿失 (快科技)

entry.title: 中秋月亮与飞机同框画面震撼 网友：这才是最美月亮 (快科技)

entry.title: 破发压力山大：中国电信出手就是40亿！ (快科技)
entry.content: 中国电信回归A股后，股价一直面临巨大的压力，让众多股民坐立不安。 9月21日中秋节之际，中国电信发布公告，控股股东中国电信集团计划自9月22日起，十二个月内择机增持公司股份，拟增持金额不少
